dt-example.title: Configuration option
dt-example.info:
This is the searchPanes extension for DataTables. It allows results to be filtered based on the values of columns.
This example shows the deactivation of the search box by setting the searchPanes dtOpts property for searching to have a value of false. The default for searching is true. This occurs on all of the panes, the info is displayed only on the second column's pane.
